DOC.brief_summary: This observational study will assess the treatment duration, progression-free survival, reason for stopping treatment and patient and tumor characteristics of bevacizumab [Avastin] treatment in patients with metastatic colorectal cancer. Data will be collected for approximately 34 months. The target sample size is >300 patients.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study of Bevacizumab [Avastin] in Patients With Metastatic Colorectal Cancer (AVASTART)
DOC.criteria: adult patients =/<18 years of age metastatic colorectal cancer patients for whom the physician has prescribed bevacizumab [Avastin] for the treatment of 1st line metastatic colorectal cancer patients, who have given written informed consent hypersensitivity to recombinant human or humanised antibodies pregnancy or breastfeeding
